name: Ilya Sutskever
background: Ilya Sutskever (born 1986) is an Israeli-Canadian computer scientist renowned for pioneering deep learning advancements. Co-inventor of AlexNet (2012) with Geoffrey Hinton and Alex Krizhevsky, which revolutionized computer vision via convolutional neural networks. Key contributor to sequence-to-sequence learning, enabling modern translation and NLP models. Co-founder and former Chief Scientist at OpenAI, instrumental in GPT series and ChatGPT development. Founded Safe Superintelligence Inc. (SSI) in 2024 to prioritize safe superintelligent AI. PhD from University of Toronto under Hinton. FRS Fellow.
